This summation expression $\sum_{i=1}^n X_i$ appears **inline**.

This is X square $X^2$

Square of the element on $i^{th}$ row and $j^{th}$ column:  $X^2_{i,j}$


**The following notations are in display form.**

Quadratic Formula: $$\frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$$     
Summation: 
$$\sum_{i=1}^n X_i$$
Estimate of a variable:
$$\widehat{abcd}$$
